channel.title: Unusual Connection Problem
channel.description:
Right earlier I posted a thread saying:
[i]Right guys I've been having a problem with getting other people onto my server. I'm extremely new to this and would appreciate it if you answered without being patronising. So I'm completely confused as to why when anyone else but me gets 'Error connecting to server' when trying to log into my server. Under the client.java the IP is set to my no-ip and yes I've checked my port is fully open. I've tested it with other clients such as Moparscape.org and it lets them log in but logs them out straight away (they come up on the log too). This leads me to think it's a problem with my client, any help would be appreciated. Thank you! [/i]
I've worked out there is more to it then this. People CAN connect to me so that rules out the issue with it being my ports. The only type of client that they can connect to me with are ones that have input boxes as they open. For example we had a 508 which had a dialouge box when it opened saying "please enter servers IP" when we entered the IP it successfully let him log in. We then tried another source and client without the dialogue box and changed the client.java to my IP, and he could not connect. (error connecting to server). Any reasons to why it would make a difference? Something i'm doing wrong? Help!
Thanks.

item.title: Unusual Connection Problem
item.dc:creator: @ProximityPlus ProximityPlus
item.description:
@ProximityPlus wrote:

baddy351:

yes, just delete that if statement

Okay I’ll try it and post back when I’ve tested.

EDIT:: didn’t work.

Read full topic

@baddy351 wrote:

yes, just delete that if statement

if (uid == 0 || uid == 99735086) {
session.close();
return false;
}

Perhaps?

item.description:
@ProximityPlus wrote:

baddy351:

Well there is a UID verification type thing, in type. Its a text file i believe. Just delete whats in there.

Sorry you’ve lost me, a text file in the Client folder?

Read full topic

Okay I’ve added you.

baddy351:

Most likely, your server doesnt allow other clients. To change this, just delete it.

Umm delete what exactly?
